text: Nersingen is a municipality in Neu-Ulm in Bavaria, Germany. The neighbours are Neu-Ulm, Elchingen, Bibertal and Pfaffenhofen an der Roth. ==Geography== Through the area of Nersingen flow three rivers: The Danube in the north and her both supply rivers Roth and Leibi, which cross Nersingen from south to north. ===Municipality arrangement=== The municipality of Nersingen has the principal village of Nersingen and the part villages Stra√ü, Leibi, Unterfahlheim, and Oberfahlheim. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Neu-Ulm (district)
title: Nersingen
